title: 植物魔法盖亚三怎么才能让他不缴械
author: 嚴233

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
嚴233 发表于 2020-1-18 17:07
而且我的文件是在文件: /config/extrameteorp/ExtraBotany.cfg
你一开始并没有说明你的版本就别指望别人能猜你用的版本了。

很显然，1.7.10 的额外植物学无法关闭缴械

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
config\extrabotany.cfg 中，设置

    # Whether Gaia Guardian III will disarm or not. Default is true.
    B:extrabotany.config.enable.gaiadisarm=false

replies.author: 嚴233
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-18 15:13
config\extrabotany.cfg 中，设置

    # Whether Gaia Guardian III will disarm or not. Default is true ...
我的是1.7.10没有这个配置

replies.author: 嚴233
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-18 15:13
config\extrabotany.cfg 中，设置

    # Whether Gaia Guardian III will disarm or not. Default is true ...
# Configuration file

client {
    # config.ExtraBotany.anotherShieldRender.desc
    B:anotherShieldRender=false

    # Whether to diable display of the shield, set to true to disable.
    B:disableShieldDisplay=false

    # Whether to disable easter eggs, set to true to disable.
    B:disableShieldRender=false

    # Used to change the x-coordinate of the display of the shield if you need.
    I:shieldDisplayX=0

    # Used to change the y-coordinate of the display of the shield if you need.
    I:shieldDisplayY=0
}


common {
    # The efficiency of Bellflower.
    I:efficiencyBellflower=6

    # The efficiency of Blue Enchantress.
    I:efficiencyBlueenchantress=100

    # The efficiency of Candy Flower.
    I:efficiencyCandyflower=8

    # The efficiency of Gemini Orchid.
    I:efficiencyGeminiorchid=4

    # The efficiency of Moonlight Lily.
    I:efficiencyMoonlightlily=3

    # The efficiency of Omni Violet.
    I:efficiencyOminiviolet=20

    # The efficiency of Pysch-O-Bloom.
    I:efficiencyPyschobloom=3

    # The efficiency of Stonesia.
    I:efficiencyStonesia=8

    # The efficiency of Sunshine Lily.
    I:efficiencySunshinelily=3

    # Whether to enable Diplop Bamboo, set to true to enable.
    B:enableDiplopbamboo=false

    # Whether to enable guns, set to true to enable.
    B:enableGuns=false

    # The Amount of Extra shield bar.
    I:extraShieldAmount=0

    # The maximum efficiency of Pysch-O-Bloom.
    I:pyschobloomMax=9
}


ids {
    # ID of Enchantment.
    I:enchDivineFavor=204

    # ID of Enchantment.
    I:enchDivineMark=205

    # ID of Enchantment.
    I:enchGaiaBlessing=203

    # ID of potion.
    I:potionC=103

    # ID of potion.
    I:potionD=104

    # ID of potion.
    I:potionFPS=100

    # ID of potion.
    I:potionRP=102

    # ID of potion.
    I:potionSPS=101
}
